Text: alright i LOVE this operating system, the ONLY problem is that its portugese and as such windows media player and things coming WITH the OS will be the same language, but if you download other things like 7zip in english they will retain being english and thats a good thing all in all i still use this on my other hard drive and regular english XP on my other one, I LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT i give it a 5 out of 5 all the way!!! id pay $ for english one
